pli-tv-pvr2.10:1.3_0: Avassutā bhikkhunī avassutassa purisapuggalassa adhakkhakaṁ ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalaṁ gahaṇaṁ sādiyati,
pli-tv-pvr2.10:1.4_0: bhikkhu kāyena kāyaṁ āmasati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa;
pli-tv-pvr2.10:1.8_0: kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyanapaccayā imā pañca āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:2.3_0: Bhikkhunī jānaṁ pārājikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicchādeti, āpatti pārājikassa;
pli-tv-pvr2.10:3.1_0: Yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr2.10:3.2_0: Yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā pañca āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:3.3_0: Ukkhittānuvattikā bhikkhunī yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjati, ñattiyā dukkaṭaṁ;
pli-tv-pvr2.10:3.6_0: bhedakānuvattikā bhikkhunī yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa;
pli-tv-pvr2.10:3.7_0: pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjati, āpatti pācittiyassa—
pli-tv-pvr2.10:3.8_0: yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā imā pañca āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:4.1_0: Aṭṭhamaṁ vatthuṁ paripūraṇapaccayā kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr2.10:4.2_0: Aṭṭhamaṁ vatthuṁ paripūraṇapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:4.3_0: Purisena—“itthannāmaṁ okāsaṁ āgacchā”ti vuttā gacchati, āpatti dukkaṭassa;
pli-tv-pvr2.10:4.6_0: aṭṭhamaṁ vatthuṁ paripūraṇapaccayā imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:5.1_0: Ussayavādikā bhikkhunī aḍḍaṁ karaṇapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:7.1_0: Ekā gāmantaraṁ gamanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:7.3_0: paṭhamaṁ pādaṁ parikkhepaṁ atikkāmeti, āpatti thullaccayassa;
pli-tv-pvr2.10:8.1_0: Samaggena saṅghena ukkhittaṁ bhikkhuniṁ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena anapaloketvā kārakasaṅghaṁ anaññāya
pli-tv-pvr2.10:8.1_1: gaṇassa chandaṁ osāraṇapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:9.1_0: Avassutā bhikkhunī avassutassa purisapuggalassa hatthato khādanīyaṁ vā bhojanīyaṁ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā bhuñjanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:10.1_1: eso purisapuggalo karissati avassuto vā anavassuto vā,
pli-tv-pvr2.10:10.1_3: yaṁ te eso purisapuggalo deti khādanīyaṁ vā bhojanīyaṁ vā taṁ tvaṁ sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khāda vā bhuñja vā”ti,
pli-tv-pvr2.10:10.2_0: Tassā vacanena khādissāmi bhuñjissāmīti paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa;
pli-tv-pvr2.10:11.1_0: Kupitā bhikkhunī yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:12.1_0: Kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā bhikkhunī yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:13.1_0: Saṁsaṭṭhā bhikkhunī yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:14.1_2: mā tumhe nānā viharitthā”ti uyyojentī yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:17.1_0: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr2.10:17.2_0: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:17.5_0: dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā imā dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
